Tag.description: Creates a key-value pair for a specific resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The name assigned to the tag that you create.

type.description: The name assigned to the tag that you create.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: Contains one or more values that you assigned to the key name you create.

type.description: Contains one or more values that you assigned to the key name you create.

properties.name: AccessRole
properties.description: Specifies the access role for the agreement.

type.description: Specifies the access role for the agreement.

properties.name: BaseDirectory
properties.description: Specifies the base directory for the agreement.

type.description: Specifies the base directory for the agreement.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A textual description for the agreement.

type.description: A textual description for the agreement.

properties.name: LocalProfileId
properties.description: A unique identifier for the local profile.

type.description: A unique identifier for the local profile.

properties.name: PartnerProfileId
properties.description: A unique identifier for the partner profile.

type.description: A unique identifier for the partner profile.

properties.name: ServerId
properties.description: A unique identifier for the server.

type.description: A unique identifier for the server.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: Specifies the status of the agreement.

type.description: Specifies the status of the agreement.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: Key-value pairs that can be used to group and search for agreements. Tags are metadata attached to agreements for any purpose.

type.description: Key-value pairs that can be used to group and search for agreements. Tags are metadata attached to agreements for any purpose.

properties.name: AgreementId
properties.description: A unique identifier for the agreement.

type.description: A unique identifier for the agreement.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the agreement.

type.description: Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the agreement.
